mapper.select: select conn_number from xms_tbl_toll_connote where shipmentid = #{shipmentId} order by connote_id desc limit 1

select sm.*, a.status as manifest_status, sc.special_instructions from xms_tbl_toll_connote as a left join xms_tbl_schedule_collection as sc on sc.shipmentid = a.shipmentid inner join xms_tbl_shipment as sm on a.shipmentid = sm.shipmentid inner join xms_tbl_shipment_type as st on sm.shipment_type_id = st.shipment_type_id where st.serviceid = #{serviceId} and a.status in (0 , 2)

select sm.*, a.status as manifest_status, sc.special_instructions from xms_tbl_toll_connote as a left join xms_tbl_schedule_collection as sc on sc.shipmentid = a.shipmentid inner join xms_tbl_shipment as sm on a.shipmentid = sm.shipmentid and sm.customer_code=#{customerCode} inner join xms_tbl_shipment_type as st on sm.shipment_type_id = st.shipment_type_id where st.serviceid = 52 and a.status in ( 0) and sm.customer_code = #{customerCode} and sm.shipmentid not in ( SELECT shipmentid FROM xms_tbl_batch_processing_detail)

select count(sm.shipmentid) from xms_tbl_toll_connote as a left join xms_tbl_schedule_collection as sc on sc.shipmentid = a.shipmentid inner join xms_tbl_shipment as sm on a.shipmentid = sm.shipmentid and sm.customer_code=#{customerCode} inner join xms_tbl_shipment_type as st on sm.shipment_type_id = st.shipment_type_id where st.serviceid = 52 and a.status in ( 0) and sm.customer_code = #{customerCode} and sm.shipmentid not in ( SELECT shipmentid FROM xms_tbl_batch_processing_detail)
mapper.insert: insert into xms_tbl_toll_connote (shipmentid,conn_number,status) select #{shipmentId} as shipmentid, if(conn_number >= #{connEnd},concat(upper(#{connPrefix}),lpad('1', length(#{connEnd}), '0')),concat(upper(#{connPrefix}),lpad(conn_number + 1, length(#{connEnd}), '0'))) as conn_number, 0 as status from (select ifnull(conn_number, #{connEnd}) as conn_number from (select substring(conn_number, 5) as conn_number from xms_tbl_toll_connote order by connote_id desc limit 1 ) as maxconn union select #{connEnd}) as conn limit 1
mapper.update: UPDATE xms_tbl_toll_connote SET status=2 WHERE shipmentid = #{shipmentId}
